Description:
Position Title:              AmbassadorEmployment Type:      Full TimeSalary:                         up to 8K AED all-inclusive, depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:             Abu Dhabi, UAE About the Client:A well-established provider of flexible workspace solutions in the region. Job Description:Provide excellent customer service – aiming to exceed the client’s expectation by being efficient, accurate and helpful.
Assist clients with general requirements and notify secretarial team of any secretarial work requested by a client.
Contact all new clients prior to their commencement date; introduce yourself as their new Receptionist, go over their basic phone requirements and team names so all basic communication set ups are ready to go as soon as they arrive
Introduce clients to the communication system and its many features, such as voicemail, diversion off premises, conference calls, etc.
Ensure everyone stepping out of the lift and passing reception is greeted with a smile – friendly and professionalSkills
Skills:
Female, up to 35 y/o and below
Minimum 3 years’ experience in similar role
Must have experience in customer service – client facing role
Highly presentable
Excellent communication skills
Immediate joiners will be prioritized
